mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_movie (num ,title, writer, price,buyNum, category,score,releaseDate,content, imagePath, regdate) VALUES(board_movie_seq.NEXTVAL,#{title}, #{writer}, #{price},0,#{category},0,#{releaseDate},#{content}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num ,title, writer, price,buyNum, category,score,releaseDate,content, imagePath, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_movie ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num = #{num}
